mapper.select: SELECT d.donation_code AS donationCode, d.member_id AS memberId, d.donation_condition AS donationCondition, d.donation_subject AS donationSubject, d.donation_achievement_money AS donationAchievementMoney, d.donation_goal_money AS donationGoalMoney, d.donation_reg_date AS donationRegDate, d.donation_end_date AS donationEndDate, d.donation_start_date AS donationStartDate, d.donation_judgment_reason_detail AS donationJudgmentReasonDetail, d.admin_member_id AS adminMemberId FROM donation AS d;
mapper.update: UPDATE donation SET donation_start_date = NOW(), donation_condition = 3 WHERE donation_code = #{donationCode};
